name: PhiGlow Holder
description: Unlike the Universal holder, the PhiGlow holder can be used for several kinds of blades, of different sizes, by dismantling the holder. It can be used for blades such as:Shading needle 3812 triple flat blade5 - round blade3 - round blade36 - round blade18U - bladePhiBlade U 304The tool has to be sterilized prior to every use, for example, in the autoclave. It is resistant to water, water vapor, organic and inorganic acids.
